title: Login Screen Problem?!
body: So I was currently patching (patch 6.11). When I had finish the patch, I clicked "Launch" it was all normal. Then I got to the login screen but for some reason the screen was black. I tried reinstalling, repairing but so far nothing worked. So plz anyone out there willing to help come here in a {{summoner:4}} and {{summoner:1}} my computer.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
